Posts.Content: i finished chemo and radiotherapy two months ago. All seemed well, then i felt as if I'd be hit by a bus........every joint in my body ached so badly,could hardly move. pain has eased quite a bit now, except pain in breast, where i had surgery and radiotherapy. is this usual? the pain is so bad I'm not sleeping,can hardly move my arm as it causes pain. I had triple neg breast cancer,so I'm not on any meds now.Â  I think i just want to be reassured this is normal......and its not something sinister. feel my head will burst with worry, trying to be positive for all around me as I don't want them to worry.
Posts.Title: terrible pain in breast.

Posts.Content: Thank you everyone for positive feedback. Spoke to breast care nurse, nothing to worry about, if I'm still concerned can go see GP. Will wait another few weeks. Nurse also said if I've been carry heavy bags,this could cause pain......I'm a woman so yes carry heavy bags of shopping etc....lol so glad I came onto this site, good to know I'm not alone. Big hugs to you all. Jacs xx
Posts.Title: terrible pain in breast.
